title: Lovemade Logo - can you help with the font? (Yes, the company's name is Lovemade!)
content:
Anyone have any idea what font is used for this logo? Please help!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [lm.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090722053426/http:/typophile.com/files/lm.jpg) | 27.77 KB |
author: lsm

comments.content: Like many logos, that looks hand drawn. (Meaning itâ€™s not a font.) If you want to find something similar, start by looking through [these search results](http://web.archive.org/web/20090722053426/http:/new.myfonts.com/search/stencil/fonts/) on myfonts.com.
